meanings.definition: Very small in size or scale.
meanings.sent1: The ultraminiature toy car fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The ultraminiature camera was perfect for capturing tiny details.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a giant holding the ultraminiature umbrella.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraminiature earrings sparkled like tiny stars.
meanings.sent5: The ultraminiature flowers added a delicate touch to the arrangement.

meanings.definition: A very small object or model.
meanings.sent1: The ultraminiature of the Eiffel Tower was incredibly detailed.
meanings.sent2: She collected ultraminiatures of famous landmarks from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The ultraminiature of the dinosaur looked cute rather than scary.
meanings.sent4: His ultraminiature train set was a marvel of precision engineering.
meanings.sent5: The ultraminiature dollhouse was a work of art in itself.
